fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Agriculture, Budget, Trade, Competition, International co-operation and development, Customs, Enlargement, Energy, Single market, External Relations, Food Safety, Climate Action, Banking and financial services, Fraud prevention
eu_initiatives:
= Interaction as an invited expert with DG AGRI European Commission concerning the EU and global sugar markets; presentations on the Outlook for the Agricultural Markets. 
= Interaction as the ACP Commercial Representative of the Swaziland Sugar Association with DG AGRI, DG TRADE and DG DEVCO in meetings at ACP House and EU institutions, especially concerning the implementation of the trade aspects of the Economic Partnership Agreements with ACP countries and the Everything But Arms initiative for LDC countries.
relevant_communication:
= Sugar market transparency: the Sugar Markets Observatory, the medium term Outlook for the Agricultural Markets. 
= Report on the effect of possible sugar market interventions such as Private Storage Aid under the CMO for Agricultural Markets. 
= Advice to ACP countries, notably eSwatini (Swaziland), concerning implementation of the SADC EPA. 
= Advice concerning the Brexit negotiations through the ACP/LDC Sugar Industries Group.
goals__remit: Consultancy services in the sugar sector: Advice concerning markets, trade flows, prices, speciality products, EU and national regulations, ACP trade agreements, Brexit, WTO and other activities in the global sugar sector.
